              1
            

            
              
            

              def default_title
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                case error_type
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :not_found
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Page not found"
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :unauthorized
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Authentication required"
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :forbidden
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Access denied"
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :server_error
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Something went wrong"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Oops!"
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def default_message
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                case error_type
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :not_found
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for. Please check the URL or navigate back to a known page."
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :unauthorized
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                  "You need to sign in to access this page. Please log in with your credentials."
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :forbidden
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                  "You don't have permission to access this resource. Please contact your administrator if you believe this is an error."
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :server_error
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                  "We're experiencing technical difficulties. Our team has been notified and is working on a fix."
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                  "An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later."
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def default_action_text
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                case error_type
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :not_found
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Go to Homepage"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :unauthorized
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Sign In"
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :forbidden
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Go Back"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :server_error
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Refresh Page"
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Go Back"
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def request
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                @request ||= helpers.request
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

            # Copyright 2025
          
      187.

    app/components/auth_form_component.rb

    20.35% lines covered

    0.0% branches covered

    113 relevant lines. 23 lines covered and 90 lines missed.
    49 total branches, 0 branches covered and 49 branches missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            
              
            

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      3.

            class AuthFormComponent < SwiftUIRails::Component::Base
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              include SwiftUIRails::Security::FormHelpers
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              prop :mode, type: Symbol, default: :login # :login or :register
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              prop :action_path, type: String, default: nil
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              prop :logo_url, type: String, default: ENV.fetch("DEFAULT_LOGO_URL", "/assets/logo.svg")
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              prop :company_name, type: String, default: "Your Company"
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              prop :csrf_token, type: String, default: nil
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

              # Login specific props
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              prop :forgot_password_path, type: String, default: "#"
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              prop :signup_path, type: String, default: "/register"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      17.

              # Register specific props

              prop :login_path, type: String, default: "/login"
          
      19.

      20.

      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21.

    22. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23.

      24.

              1

      25.

              1

      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              swift_ui do
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                div.flex.tw("min-h-full").tw("flex-col").justify_center.px(6).py(12).tw("lg:px-8") do

                  # Logo and title section
          
      36.

      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41.

      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      text(mode == :login ? "Sign in to your account" : "Create your account")

    43.

      64.

              def input_border_classes(field)

    294. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if errors[field].present?

    295.

      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

                  "outline outline-1 -outline-offset-1 outline-gray-300"
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      299.

              def flash_alert_classes
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            
              
            

                case flash_type
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :error, :alert
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            
              
            

                  "bg-red-50 text-red-800 border border-red-200"

    305. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when :success
          
      306.

      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      308.

      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      310.

              def centered_layout

            # ButtonComponent is maintained for backwards compatibility

            class ButtonComponent < SimpleButtonComponent
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def initialize(...)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                ActiveSupport::Deprecation.warn(
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  "ButtonComponent is deprecated and will be removed in SwiftUIRails 2.0. " \
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

                  "Please use SimpleButtonComponent instead.",
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                  caller(1)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                super
          
      16.

                def card_collection(cards:, **options, &block)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Leverage ViewComponent 2.0 with_collection for 10x performance

    147. 
            

            
              
            

                  with_collection(cards, **options) do |card_data, counter|
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148.

                    if card_data.is_a?(Hash)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                      new(
          
      150.

      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                        content: card_data[:content] || "Card content",
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                        collection_item: card_data,
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                        collection_counter: counter,
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                        **card_data.except(:title, :content)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                      )
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    else
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157.

      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158.

      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159.

      160.

    11. 
            

            
              
            

                class_attribute :_story_session_config, default: {}
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              class_methods do
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            
              
            

                # Define a live, interactive story
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def live_story(name, &block)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            
              
            

                  story_config = LiveStoryDefinition.new(name)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  story_config.instance_eval(&block) if block_given?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                  _live_story_definitions[name] = story_config
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Create the story method that supports both static and live modes
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            
              
            

                  define_method(name) do |**props|
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            
              
            

                    if @live_mode && @story_session
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      # Live mode: return component with session management
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            
              
            

                      render_live_component(name, **props)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      # Static mode: traditional story rendering
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            
              
            

                      render_static_component(name, **props)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                # Configure session behavior for all stories
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def session_config(&block)
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                  config = SessionConfig.new
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  config.instance_eval(&block) if block_given?
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                  self._story_session_config = config
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                # Check if a story is live-enabled
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def live_story?(name)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  _live_story_definitions.key?(name.to_sym)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get live story configuration
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def live_story_config(name)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                  _live_story_definitions[name.to_sym]
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

              # Enable live mode for this story instance
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def enable_live_mode!(story_session)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                @live_mode = true
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                @story_session = story_session
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

              # Render component in live mode with session management
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def render_live_component(story_name, **props)
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                config = self.class.live_story_config(story_name)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return render_static_component(story_name, **props) unless config
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                # Update session props
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                @story_session.update_props!(props) if props.any?
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                # Create component instance
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                component_class = config.component_class
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                component = component_class.new(**@story_session.props.symbolize_keys)
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                # Enable stateful features if component supports it
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                if component.respond_to?(:story_session_id=)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                  component.story_session_id = @story_session.session_id
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Store session lookup for component callbacks
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.cache.write(
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                    "story_session_lookup:#{@story_session.session_id}",
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

                    {
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                      story_name: @story_session.story_name,
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                      variant: @story_session.variant
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                    },
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                    expires_in: 30.minutes
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                  )
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                # Restore component state
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                component.restore_state!(@story_session.state) if component.respond_to?(:restore_state!)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                component
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

              # Render component in static mode (traditional)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def render_static_component(story_name, **props)
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                config = self.class.live_story_config(story_name)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if config
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                  component_class = config.component_class
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                  component_class.new(**props)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Fallback to traditional component rendering
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  # This assumes the story method exists and returns a component
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  super(**props) if defined?(super)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

              # Configuration class for live stories
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              class LiveStoryDefinition
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                attr_reader :name, :component_class, :controls_config, :session_config
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def initialize(name)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  @name = name
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                  @controls_config = {}
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  @session_config = {}
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def component(klass)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  @component_class = klass
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def controls(&block)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  controls_builder = ControlsBuilder.new
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  controls_builder.instance_eval(&block) if block_given?
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
            

                  @controls_config = controls_builder.controls
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def session_state(&block)
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                  session_builder = SessionStateBuilder.new
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  session_builder.instance_eval(&block) if block_given?
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                  @session_config = session_builder.config
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def live_updates(enabled: true)
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

                  @session_config[:live_updates] = enabled
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def stimulus_controller(name)
          
      136.

                  @session_config[:stimulus_controller] = name
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

              # Builder for control definitions
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              class ControlsBuilder
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                attr_reader :controls
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def initialize
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

                  @controls = {}
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def text(name, default: nil, **options)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                  @controls[name] = { type: :text, default: default, **options }
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def select(name, options:, default: nil, **opts)
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                  @controls[name] = { type: :select, options: options, default: default, **opts }
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def boolean(name, default: false, **options)
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

                  @controls[name] = { type: :boolean, default: default, **options }
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def number(name, default: 0, min: nil, max: nil, step: 1, **options)
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                  @controls[name] = {
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                    type: :number,
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                    default: default,
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                    min: min,
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                    max: max,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                    step: step,
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                    **options
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

              # Builder for session state configuration
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              class SessionStateBuilder
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                attr_reader :config
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def initialize
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                  @config = {}
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def initial_state(**state)

    181. 
            

            
              
            

                  @config[:initial_state] = state
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def persist_for(duration)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  @config[:persist_for] = duration
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def auto_save(enabled = true)
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                  @config[:auto_save] = enabled
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

              # Configuration for session behavior
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              class SessionConfig
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                attr_accessor :default_persist_duration, :auto_save_enabled, :live_updates_enabled
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

                def initialize
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                  @default_persist_duration = 30.minutes
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                  @auto_save_enabled = true
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200.

            class EnhancedProductListComponent < SwiftUIRails::Component::Base

              prop :enable_animations, type: [ TrueClass, FalseClass ], default: true
          
      17.

              def render_empty_state

                  # if empty_state.present?
          
      190.

                  #   empty_state

    193. 
            

            
              
            

                    safe_join([
          
      194.

                      content_tag(:div, class: "text-gray-400 mb-4") do
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                        content_tag(:svg, class: "mx-auto h-12 w-12", fill: "none", viewBox: "0 0 24 24", stroke: "currentColor") do
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

                          content_tag(:path, "",
          
      197.

                            stroke_linecap: "round",
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

                            stroke_linejoin: "round",
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

                            stroke_width: "2",
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            
              
            

                            d: "M20 13V6a2 2 0 00-2-2H6a2 2 0 00-2 2v7m16 0v5a2 2 0 01-2 2H6a2 2 0 01-2 2v-5m16 0h-2M4 13h2"
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

                          )
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                      end,
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                      content_tag(:h3, "No products found", class: "text-lg font-medium text-gray-900 mb-2"),
          
      205.

                      content_tag(:p, "Try adjusting your filters or search criteria.", class: "text-gray-500")

              def render_product_card(product, index)
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                # card_content = if product_card.present?
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                #   # Use custom product card slot
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                #   product_card.call(product: product, index: index)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                # else
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

                #   # Default product card implementation
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                #   render_default_product_card(product, index)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                # end
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                card_content = render_default_product_card(product, index)
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                # Wrap in animation container
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                content_tag(:div,
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                  class: product_card_classes(index),
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

                  data: {
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                    "enhanced-product-list-target": "productCard",
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

                    "product-id": product_id(product),
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                    "product-name": product_name(product),
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
            

                    "product-price": product_price(product),
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                    "product-color": product_color(product)
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                ) do
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

                  card_content
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def render_default_product_card(product, index)
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

                content_tag(:div, class: "group relative") do
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                  safe_join([
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Product image with flash-resistant animations
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

                    content_tag(:div, class: "product-image-container relative overflow-hidden rounded-lg") do
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

                      safe_join([
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

                        link_to(product_url(product), class: "block h-full") do
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
            

                          image_tag(product_image_url(product),
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
            

                            alt: product_alt_text(product),
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
            

                            class: image_classes,
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                            loading: "lazy" # Improve loading performance
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
            

                          )
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                        end,
          
      250.

                        (render_quick_actions(product) if show_quick_actions)
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

                      ].compact)
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252.

      253.

      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
            

                      safe_join([
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                        # Product name and price with consistent layout
          
      258.

      259.

                          safe_join([
          
      260.

                            content_tag(:div, class: "flex-1 min-w-0") do
          
      261.

                              safe_join([
          
      262.

                                content_tag(:h3, class: "text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 truncate leading-tight") do

                                  link_to(product_url(product),
          
      264.

                                    class: "hover:text-blue-600 transition-colors duration-200"
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
            

                                  ) do
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
            

                                    product_name(product)
          
      267.

      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            
              
            

                                end,
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                                if product_color(product).present?
          
      270.

                                  content_tag(:p, product_color(product),
          
      271.

      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            
              
            

                                  )

    273. 
            

            
              
            

                                end
          
      274.

      275.

      276.

                            content_tag(:p, formatted_price(product),
          
      277.

                              class: "text-sm font-semibold text-gray-900 whitespace-nowrap"
          
      278.

              def render_quick_actions(product)
          
      288.

      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            
              
            

                ) do
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            
              
            

                  content_tag(:div, class: "flex gap-2") do
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            
              
            

                    safe_join([
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            
              
            

                      content_tag(:button,
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            
              
            

                        class: "p-2 bg-white rounded-full shadow-lg hover:bg-gray-50 transition-transform duration-200 transform hover:scale-110",
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            
              
            

                        data: { action: "click->enhanced-product-list#quickView".html_safe, product_id: product_id(product) }
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            
              
            

                      ) do
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            
              
            

                        content_tag(:svg, class: "w-4 h-4", fill: "none", stroke: "currentColor", viewBox: "0 0 24 24") do
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            
              
            

                          content_tag(:path, "",
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            
              
            

                            stroke_linecap: "round",
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            
              
            

                            stroke_linejoin: "round",
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            
              
            

                            stroke_width: "2",
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            
              
            

                            d: "M15 12a3 3 0 11-6 0 3 3 0 016 0z M2.458 12C3.732 7.943 7.523 5 12 5c4.478 0 8.268 2.943 9.542 7-1.274 4.057-5.064 7-9.542 7-4.477 0-8.268-2.943-9.542-7z"
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            
              
            

                          )
          
      304.

                        end
          
      305.

      306.

                      content_tag(:button,

      308.

                        data: { action: "click->enhanced-product-list#addToCart".html_safe, product_id: product_id(product) }

                            d: "M3 3h2l.4 2M7 13h10l4-8H5.4m0 0L7 13m0 0l-2.5 5M7 13l2.5 5m6-5v6a2 2 0 01-2 2H9a2 2 0 01-2-2v-6m8 0V9a2 2 0 00-2-2H9a2 2 0 00-2 2v4.01"

              # CSS Classes
          
      325.

              1
            

            
              
            

              def container_classes
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            
              
            

                "bg-#{background_color} transition-colors duration-500 ease-in-out"
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def inner_container_classes
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            
              
            

                "mx-auto max-w-#{max_width} px-4 py-#{container_padding} sm:px-6 lg:px-8"
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            
              
            

              end

              def title_classes
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            
              
            

                "text-2xl font-bold tracking-tight text-gray-900"
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336.
