    337. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def grid_classes
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            
              
            

                base_classes = "grid gap-#{gap} transition-[grid-template-columns,gap] duration-700 ease-in-out"
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            
              
            

                column_classes = COLUMN_CONFIGS[columns] || COLUMN_CONFIGS[:auto]
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            
              
            

                "#{base_classes} #{column_classes}"
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def product_card_classes(index)
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            
              
            

                classes = [ "relative" ]
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            
              
            

                # Add stable base classes to prevent flash during re-renders
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            
              
            

                classes << "product-card-stable" # CSS containment and stability
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            
              
            

                classes << "flash-resistant" # Optimized transitions
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            
              
            

                classes << "transform-gpu" # Force GPU acceleration
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if enable_animations
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            
              
            

                  classes << "hover:scale-#{hover_scale} hover:z-10"
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Completely remove any initial state animations that cause flash
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            
              
            

                  classes << "hover:scale-102 hover:z-10"
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            
              
            

                classes.join(" ")
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def image_classes
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            
              
            

                "aspect-square w-full rounded-md bg-gray-200 object-cover transition-transform duration-300 ease-out group-hover:scale-105"
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            
              
            

              # Data extraction methods (same as before)
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def product_name(product)
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            
              
            

                product.try(:name) || product.try(:title) || product[:name] || product[:title] || "Product"
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def product_image_url(product)
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            

            
              
            

                product.try(:image_url) || product.try(:image) || product[:image_url] || product[:image] || "https://via.placeholder.com/400x400?text=No+Image"
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def product_url(product)
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if product.respond_to?(:id)
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  "/products/#{product.id}"
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                elsif product[:id]
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            
              
            

                  "/products/#{product[:id]}"
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else

      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def product_color(product)
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            
              
            

                product.try(:color) || product.try(:variant) || product[:color] || product[:variant]
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def product_price(product)
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            
              
            

                product.try(:price) || product[:price] || 0
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def product_id(product)
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            
              
            

                product.try(:id) || product[:id] || SecureRandom.hex(4)
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def product_alt_text(product)
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            

            
              
            

                name = product_name(product)
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            

            
              
            

                color = product_color(product)
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if color.present?
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            

            
              
            

                  "#{name} in #{color}"
          
      401. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    401. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            

            
              
            

                  name
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def formatted_price(product)
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            

            
              
            

                price = product_price(product)
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if price.is_a?(Numeric)
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            

            
              
            

                  "#{currency_symbol}#{price}"
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            

            
              
            

                  price.to_s
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def products_json
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            

            
              
            

                products.to_json
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            

            
              
            

            end

              def url_with_page(page)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use Rails helpers if available in view context
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if respond_to?(:url_for)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                  url_for(request.params.merge(page: page, only_path: false))
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  # Fallback to manual construction
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                  uri = URI.parse(base_url)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

                  params = Rack::Utils.parse_query(uri.query)
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  params["page"] = page.to_s
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                  uri.query = params.to_query
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                  uri.to_s
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def page_range
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                return (1..total_pages).to_a if total_pages <= MAX_VISIBLE_PAGES
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if current_page <= 3
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  [ 1, 2, 3, 4, "...", total_pages ]
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                elsif current_page >= total_pages - 2
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                  [ 1, "...", total_pages - 3, total_pages - 2, total_pages - 1, total_pages ]
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                  [ 1, "...", current_page - 1, current_page, current_page + 1, "...", total_pages ]
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133.

              def render_product_image

    152. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if product[:image_url].present?

              def apply_aspect_ratio(element)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                case image_aspect_ratio
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when "square"
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  element.aspect("square")
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when "auto"
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                  element.aspect("auto").lg("h-80")
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                  element.aspect(image_aspect_ratio)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193.

                        Rails.logger.debug "ProductLayoutComponent: Calling grid with columns: #{columns}, gap: #{gap}"
          
      78.

                        grid(columns: columns, spacing: gap) do
          
      79.

                          products.each_with_index do |product, index|

              def render_sort_dropdown

              def render_top_filters
          
      220.

              def cta_button_classes
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
            

                case cta_style
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when "primary"
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

                  "bg-black text-white rounded-md hover:bg-gray-800 transition-colors font-medium"
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when "secondary"
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                  "bg-gray-200 text-gray-900 rounded-md hover:bg-gray-300 transition-colors font-medium"
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
                
                  when: 0
                
              
            

                when "outline"
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                  "border-2 border-gray-900 text-gray-900 rounded-md hover:bg-gray-900 hover:text-white transition-colors font-medium"
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
            

                  "bg-blue-600 text-white rounded-md hover:bg-blue-700 transition-colors font-medium"
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

              # Helper methods to extract data from product objects/hashes
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def product_id(product)
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                product.respond_to?(:id) ? product.id : product[:id]
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def product_name(product)
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if product.respond_to?(:name)
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  product.name
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                elsif product.respond_to?(:title)
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            
              
            

                  product.title
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            
              
            

                  product[:name] || product[:title] || "Untitled Product"
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def product_description(product)
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if product.respond_to?(:description)
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  product.description
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                elsif product.respond_to?(:summary)
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            
              
            

                  product.summary
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      259.

              def product_price(product)
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if product.respond_to?(:price)
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  product.price
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0

    268.

                else

                  product.image.url

              def product_url(product)

    127. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if product.respond_to?(:id)

                  "/products/#{product[:id]}"

    131.

                else

              def product_price(product)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                product.try(:price) || product[:price] || 0

              def product_alt_text(product)

    147.

              def formatted_price(product)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155.

      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158.

              def formatted_price(amount)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0

    39. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                # Handle string prices (e.g., "35.99")
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0

    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43.

    48. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0

    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50.

                has_slots = icon? || loading_state? || counter
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if has_slots
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

                  button(
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                    nil,  # No title when using block
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                    class: button_classes,
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

                    disabled: disabled,
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                    style: inline_styles
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                  ) do
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Include title in block content
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                    concat(button_title)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                    # ViewComponent 2.0 slot composition
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if icon
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

                      concat(icon.to_s)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if loading_state
          
      95.

                      concat(loading_state.to_s)
          
      96.

      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Collection counter badge if in collection
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    if counter
          
      100.

                      concat(content_tag(:span, " (#{counter + 1})",
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                        class: "text-xs text-gray-400"))
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  # Simple button without slots
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  button(
          
      107.

      108.

      109.

              class << self

                def button_collection(buttons:, **options, &block)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Use ViewComponent 2.0 standard with_collection for 10x performance
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

                  with_collection(buttons, **options)
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122.

              def button_classes
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use CSS class builder to avoid text-prefix conflicts
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

                CssClassBuilder.build do |builder|
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Base classes
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                  builder.add("inline-flex items-center transition-colors duration-200 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-offset-2")
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Background and text colors (from variant or custom)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

                  if background_color.present? || text_color.present?
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    # Custom colors override variant
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            
              
            

                    if background_color.blank?
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                      # Use variant background if no custom background
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

                      variant_config = VARIANT_CLASSES[variant] || VARIANT_CLASSES[:primary]
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                      builder.add("bg-#{variant_config[:bg]} hover:bg-#{variant_config[:hover_bg]}")
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                      # Apply custom background color
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      # Ensure the full class name is generated for Tailwind to detect
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                      bg_class = "bg-#{background_color}"
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

                      hover_class = "hover:bg-#{background_color}"
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                      builder.add("#{bg_class} #{hover_class} hover:brightness-90")
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    if text_color.present?
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            
              
            

                      builder.text_color(text_color)
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                    else
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                      # Smart default text color based on background
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

                      if background_color.present?
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                        # Provide smart text color default for custom backgrounds
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                        if is_light_background?(background_color)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                          builder.text_color("gray-900")  # Dark text on light background
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                        else
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

                          builder.text_color("white")     # Light text on dark background
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

                        end
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            
              
            

                      else
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                        # Use variant text color if no custom background
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            
              
            

                        variant_config = VARIANT_CLASSES[variant] || VARIANT_CLASSES[:primary]
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                        builder.text_color(variant_config[:text])
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

                      end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

                    end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    # Use variant preset
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

                    variant_config = VARIANT_CLASSES[variant] || VARIANT_CLASSES[:primary]
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

                    builder.add("bg-#{variant_config[:bg]} hover:bg-#{variant_config[:hover_bg]}")
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            
              
            

                    builder.add("focus:ring-#{variant_config[:bg].split('-').first}-500")
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                    builder.text_color(variant_config[:text])
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Corner radius
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  radius_key = corner_radius.is_a?(String) ? corner_radius.to_sym : corner_radius
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  builder.add(CORNER_RADIUS_OPTIONS[radius_key] || CORNER_RADIUS_OPTIONS[:md])
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Size and padding
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  if padding_x.present? || padding_y.present?
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                    # Custom padding
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

                    builder.add("px-#{padding_x || '4'} py-#{padding_y || '2'}")
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                  else
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    # Use size preset
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

                    size_config = SIZE_PRESETS[size] || SIZE_PRESETS[:md]
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            
              
            

                    builder.add("px-#{size_config[:px]} py-#{size_config[:py]}")
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Font styling - apply font weight and size separately to avoid text- prefix conflicts
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                  builder.add("font-#{font_weight}")
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Font size (will be applied before text color to avoid conflicts)
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  if font_size.present?
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                    builder.text_size(font_size)
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                    size_config = SIZE_PRESETS[size] || SIZE_PRESETS[:md]
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                    builder.text_size(size_config[:text])
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Disabled state
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  builder.add("opacity-50 cursor-not-allowed") if disabled
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      200.

              private
          
      201.

              def inline_styles
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
            

                styles = []
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                if background_color.present?
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  # Support hex colors, CSS color names, or Tailwind color references
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  if background_color.start_with?("#")
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    styles << "background-color: #{background_color}"
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  elsif background_color.include?("-")
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Tailwind color like "blue-500" - handled in CSS classes
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
            

                    styles << "background-color: #{background_color}"
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                if text_color.present?
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  if text_color.start_with?("#")
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                    styles << "color: #{text_color}"
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  elsif text_color.include?("-")
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                    # Tailwind color - handled in CSS classes
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  else
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                    styles << "color: #{text_color}"
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                styles.empty? ? nil : styles.join("; ")
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def is_light_background?(color)
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            
              
            

                # Map of Tailwind color shades to determine if they're light or dark
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            
              
            

                # Light colors (need dark text): 50, 100, 200, 300, 400
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            
              
            

                # Dark colors (need light text): 500, 600, 700, 800, 900
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return false unless color.include?("-")
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            
              
            

                # Extract shade number from Tailwind color (e.g., "blue-500" -> "500")
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            
              
            

                shade = color.split("-").last.to_i
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            
              
            

                # Colors 50-400 are generally light, 500-900 are dark
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            
              
            

                shade <= 400
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            
              
            

            # Copyright 2025
          
      244.

    43.48% lines covered

    0.0% branches covered

            # frozen_string_literal: true
          
      2.

              1
            

            
              
            

            class SimpleCardComponent < SwiftUIRails::Component::Base
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              renders_one :header
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              renders_one :footer
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              prop :variant, type: Symbol, default: :elevated
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              prop :padding, type: Symbol, default: :md
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11.

            class RailsFirstDemoController < ApplicationController
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            
              
            

              # SECURITY: CSRF protection disabled for demo actions that use Turbo Streams
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            
              
            

              # This is a demo controller showing Rails-first patterns and is not meant for production use
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              skip_before_action :verify_authenticity_token, only: [ :increment_counter, :add_todo, :delete_todo, :search ]
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def index
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            
              
            

                # Initialize demo data in session
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            
              
            

                session[:demo_counter] ||= 0
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            
              
            

                session[:demo_todos] ||= [
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            
              
            

                  { id: 1, text: "Learn Rails-first patterns", completed: true },
          
      12.

                  { id: 2, text: "Build with Turbo and Stimulus", completed: false }
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            
              
            

                ]
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            
              
            

                session[:demo_products] ||= [

                  { id: 4, name: "Rails Sticker Pack", price: 9.99, category: "accessories" },

                  { id: 5, name: "Advanced Rails Book", price: 39.99, category: "books" }
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            
              
            

                ]
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      22.

                @counter = session[:demo_counter]

                @todos = session[:demo_todos]

                @search_query = params[:search] || ""

                @selected_category = params[:category] || "all"

              def increment_counter
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            
              
            

                session[:demo_counter] = (session[:demo_counter] || 0) + 1
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            
              
            

                @counter = session[:demo_counter]
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            
              
            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            
              
            

                  format.turbo_stream { render turbo_stream: turbo_stream.replace("rails-counter", partial: "rails_first_demo/counter", locals: { counter: @counter }) }
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            
              
            

                  format.html { redirect_to rails_first_demo_path }
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def add_todo
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                todos = session[:demo_todos] || []
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            
              
            

                new_todo = {
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

                  id: Time.now.to_i,
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

                  text: params[:todo_text],
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            
              
            

                  completed: false
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                }
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

                todos << new_todo
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

                session[:demo_todos] = todos
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

                @todos = todos
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                  format.turbo_stream do
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

                    render turbo_stream: [
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                      turbo_stream.replace("rails-todos", partial: "rails_first_demo/todos", locals: { todos: @todos }),
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
            

                      turbo_stream.replace("todo-form", partial: "rails_first_demo/todo_form")
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                    ]
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                  format.html { redirect_to rails_first_demo_path }
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def delete_todo
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

                todos = session[:demo_todos] || []
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

                todos.reject! { |todo| todo[:id] == params[:id].to_i }
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

                session[:demo_todos] = todos
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            
              
            

                @todos = todos
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                  format.turbo_stream { render turbo_stream: turbo_stream.replace("rails-todos", partial: "rails_first_demo/todos", locals: { todos: @todos }) }
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                  format.html { redirect_to rails_first_demo_path }
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def search
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                @products = filter_products(session[:demo_products], params[:search], params[:category])
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                @search_query = params[:search] || ""
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                @selected_category = params[:category] || "all"
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                  format.turbo_stream { render turbo_stream: turbo_stream.replace("rails-products", partial: "rails_first_demo/products", locals: { products: @products, search_query: @search_query, selected_category: @selected_category }) }

              def filter_products(products, search_query, category)
          
      87.

                  else: 0

      90.

              def filter_products(products, filters)
