              def initialize(controller)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            
              
            

                @controller = controller
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            
              
            

                @request = controller.request
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            
              
            

                @rendered_content = nil

      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            
              
            

              # Required for ViewComponent::TestHelpers
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def vc_test_controller
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            
              
            

                @vc_test_controller ||= controller
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            
              
            

              # Override render to use render_inline behavior
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def render(component, &block)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            
              
            

                # Store the component for later retrieval
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            
              
            

                @last_component = component
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            
              
            

                # Use ViewComponent's render_inline which returns actual HTML
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                @rendered_content = if Rails.version.to_f >= 6.1
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            
              
            

                  vc_test_controller.view_context.render(component, {}, &block)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            
              
            

                  vc_test_controller.view_context.render_component(component, &block)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            
              
            

                # Return the actual HTML for inline use in stories
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            
              
            

                @rendered_content
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            
              
            

              # Execute a story method in this rendering context
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def render_story(story_instance, story_method, **kwargs)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            
              
            

                # Ensure the story instance has access to the view context for swift_ui helper
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                if story_instance.respond_to?(:view_context=)
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            
              
            

                  story_instance.view_context = controller.view_context
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            
              
            

                # Instead of copying methods, execute the story method directly
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            
              
            

                # but make sure it uses our render method
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            
              
            

                story_instance.define_singleton_method(:render) do |component, &block|
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Call StoryRenderer's render method
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            
              
            

                  @story_renderer.render(component, &block)
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            
              
            

                # Store reference to self so story can call our render
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            
              
            

                story_instance.instance_variable_set(:@story_renderer, self)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get the story method's parameters
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            
              
            

                method_params = story_instance.method(story_method).parameters
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            
              
            

                # Filter kwargs to only include parameters the story method accepts
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            
              
            

                accepted_params = method_params.select { |type, name| [ :key, :keyreq ].include?(type) }.map(&:last)
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            
              
            

                filtered_kwargs = kwargs.slice(*accepted_params)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                # Make view context available to the story instance
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                view_context = controller.view_context
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                story_instance.define_singleton_method(:view_context) { view_context }
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                # Ensure the story has access to swift_ui helper
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                unless story_instance.respond_to?(:swift_ui)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                  story_instance.define_singleton_method(:swift_ui) do |&block|
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

                    view_context.swift_ui(&block)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

                # Execute the story method
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                result = if filtered_kwargs.any?
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                  story_instance.send(story_method, **filtered_kwargs)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                else
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

                  story_instance.send(story_method)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                # For simple stories that return component instances, return the component
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                # For complex stories that return HTML, wrap in a simple component
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                if result.respond_to?(:call) && result.is_a?(ViewComponent::Base)
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  result
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                elsif result.is_a?(ActiveSupport::SafeBuffer) || result.is_a?(String)
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  # For HTML content (including swift_ui DSL output), use the wrapper component
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                  StoryHtmlWrapperComponent.new(html_content: result)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                else
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                  # Default case - convert to string
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

                  StoryHtmlWrapperComponent.new(html_content: result.to_s)
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119.

              def self.find_or_create(story_name, variant, session_id)

      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59.

              def self.find(story_name, variant, session_id)

                data = Rails.cache.read(key)
          
      76.

                  then: 0

              def save!

              def component_instance
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            
              
            

                # SECURITY: Validate story class name to prevent RCE
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            
              
            

                story_class_name = "#{story_name.camelize}Stories"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            
              
            

                story_class = safe_constantize_story(story_class_name)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            
              
            

                story_instance = story_class.new
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            
              
            

                # Get the story method parameters to filter props
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            
              
            

                method_obj = story_instance.method(variant.to_sym)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            
              
            

                method_params = method_obj.parameters
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            
              
            

                # Filter props to only include valid parameters
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            
              
            

                accepted_params = method_params.select { |type, name| [ :key, :keyreq ].include?(type) }.map(&:last)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            
              
            

                filtered_props = props.symbolize_keys.slice(*accepted_params)
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            
              
            

                # Create component using StoryRenderer for proper context
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            
              
            

                renderer = StoryRenderer.new(ApplicationController.new)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            
              
            

                component = renderer.render_story(story_instance, variant.to_sym, **filtered_props)
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            
              
            

                # If component responds to state management, restore its state
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
            

                if component.is_a?(ViewComponent::Base) && component.respond_to?(:restore_state!)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            
              
            

                  component.story_session_id = session_id
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            
              
            

                  component.restore_state!(state)
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            
              
            

                component
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue NameError, NoMethodError => e
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Error creating component instance: #{e.message}"
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            
              
            

                nil
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def update_state!(new_state)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            
              
            

                self.state = state.merge(new_state)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            
              
            

                save!
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_state_change
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def update_props(new_props)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            
              
            

                self.props = props.merge(new_props)
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            
              
            

                save!
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def update_props!(new_props)
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            
              
            

                self.props = props.merge(new_props)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            
              
            

                save!
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_prop_change
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def save_component_state(component_instance)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                return unless component_instance.respond_to?(:state_variables)
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            
              
            

                # Extract current state from component
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            
              
            

                current_state = {}
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            
              
            

                component_instance.state_variables.each do |var_name|
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            
              
            

                  current_state[var_name.to_s] = component_instance.public_send(var_name)
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            
              
            

                update_state!(current_state)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            
              
            

              # Alias for accessing current state - used by storybook controller
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def current_state
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            
              
            

                state
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def reset_state!
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            
              
            

                self.state = {}
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            
              
            

                save!
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            
              
            

                broadcast_state_change
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def cache_key
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            
              
            

                self.class.cache_key(story_name, variant, session_id)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def self.cache_key(story_name, variant, session_id)
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            
              
            

                "story_session:#{story_name}:#{variant}:#{session_id}"
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def broadcast_state_change
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            
              
            

                # Broadcast to Turbo streams for real-time updates
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            
              
            

                Turbo::StreamsChannel.broadcast_update_to(
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            
              
            

                  "story_session_#{session_id}",
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            
              
            

                  target: "component-preview",
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            
              
            

                  partial: "storybook/live_component",
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            
              
            

                  locals: {
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            
              
            

                    component: component_instance,
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            
              
            

                    story_session: self
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Error broadcasting state change: #{e.message}"
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def broadcast_prop_change
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            
              
            

                # Broadcast prop updates for real-time control updates
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            
              
            

                # SECURITY: Validate story class name to prevent RCE
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            
              
            

                story_class_name = "#{story_name.camelize}Stories"
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            
              
            

                story_class = safe_constantize_story(story_class_name)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            
              
            

                Turbo::StreamsChannel.broadcast_update_to(
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            
              
            

                  "story_session_#{session_id}",
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            
              
            

                  target: "controls-panel",
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            
              
            

                  partial: "storybook/live_controls",
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            
              
            

                  locals: {
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            
              
            

                    story_session: self,
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            
              
            

                    story_class: story_class
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            
              
            

                  }
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            
              
            

                )
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            
              
            

              rescue => e
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            
              
            

                Rails.logger.error "Error broadcasting prop change: #{e.message}"
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              private
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            
              1
            

            
              
            

              def safe_constantize_story(story_class_name)
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                unless ALLOWED_STORIES.include?(story_class_name)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "[SECURITY] Attempted to instantiate unauthorized story class: #{story_class_name}"
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            
              
            

                  raise SecurityError, "Unauthorized story class: #{story_class_name}"
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            
              
            

                begin
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            
              
            

                  story_class = story_class_name.constantize
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            
              
            

                  # Verify it's actually a ViewComponent Storybook Stories class
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            
              
                
                  else: 0
                
              
                
                  then: 0
                
              
            

                  unless defined?(ViewComponent::Storybook::Stories) && story_class < ViewComponent::Storybook::Stories
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            
              
            

                    Rails.logger.error "[SECURITY] Class #{story_class_name} is not a valid Stories class"
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            
              
            

                    raise SecurityError, "#{story_class_name} is not a valid Stories class"
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            
              
            

                  end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            
              
            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.info "[AUDIT] StorySession instantiated story: #{story_class_name}"
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            
              
            

                  story_class
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            
              
            

                rescue NameError => e
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            
              
            

                  Rails.logger.error "[ERROR] Story class not found: #{story_class_name} - #{e.message}"
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            
              
            

                  raise ArgumentError, "Story class #{story_class_name} not found"
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            
              
            

                end
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            
              
            

              end
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            
              
            

            end
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            
              
            

            # Copyright 2025
          
      226.
